name: Improved Shield Focus
text: Your mastery makes the most of your shield.
benefit: You reduce the armor check penalty of any shield you are using by 1. You also use your character level in place of your base attack bonus for the purpose of shield mastery feat prerequisites.
staminaText: You can spend 3 stamina points to negate your shield’s armor check penalty for one skill check. (See page 18.)
text_zh: 你的技巧使你能够充分利用你的盾牌。
benefit_zh: 你所使用的任何盾牌的防具检定减值少1，同时，在选择盾牌掌握专长时，可以用角色等级作为BAB来满足前置条件。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗3点耐力在一次技能检定上忽视来自你盾牌的防具检定减值。
